quote_first: I'd just looked up at the clock, to make sure time wasn't getting away from me, when I heard the shot. It was
quote_last: . I didn't know what to do.
quote_raw: I'd just looked up at the clock, to make sure time wasn't getting away from me, when I heard the shot. It was two minutes after four. I didn't know what to do.
title: Southern Ghost
author: Carolyn G. Hart
